definitions.definition: A part of an exam or series of exams in which the candidate has to demonstrate their practical ability
A prop that has some degree of functionality, rather than being a mere imitation.
Based on practice or action rather than theory or hypothesis
definitions.example: Jack didn't get an engineering degree, but has practical knowledge of metalworking.

definitions.definition: Being likely to be effective and applicable to a real situation; able to be put to use
definitions.example: Jack's knowledge has the practical benefit of giving us useful prototype parts.

definitions.definition: Of a person, having skills or knowledge that are practical
definitions.example: All in all, Jack's a very practical chap.

definitions.definition: Of a prop: having some degree of functionality, rather than being a mere imitation.
